mapper.select: SELECT U.userName, U.userCode, U.password, U.employeeCode, U.sex, (SELECT NAME FROM SYSTEMDEPARTMENT T WHERE T.DEPARTMENTCODE=U.DEPARTMENTCODE)AS departement, U.superiorUserCode, U.assitantUserCode, U.isLeader, U.email, U.activeState, U.officePhone, U.mobile, U.mobile, U.remark FROM SYSTEMUSER U where userCode=#{userCode}
